alert.note: Alert for Sacramento Mountains Above 7500 Feet (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS El Paso (Southern New Mexico and extreme Western Texas)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 27 at 6:26PM MST until December 28 at 8:00AM MST by NWS El Paso
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 8 PM MST THIS EVENING UNTIL 8 AM MST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches are possible. Winds gusting to 40 to 60 mph. * WHERE...Portions of south central New Mexico...higher elevations of the Sacramento Mountains. * WHEN...8 PM MST this evening until 8 AM MST Tuesday. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Strong winds may produce blowing and drifting snow overnight, and create poor visibilities.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
